The monsoon was particularly unforgiving this year. Mumbai was practically drowning, and I, Priya Sharma, was supposed to be on a flight to Delhi for my cousin’s wedding. My excitement was bubbling, my saree was packed, and I’d even managed to prepone all my meetings. Everything was set, or so I thought.
